description:
In this video I discuss the EmeraldWhale malware campaign that used different tools to scan for git config files in the web root and secret credentials stored within environment files and other webpage assets and exploit those valid credentials to create malicious SMTP servers and other malicious services.

Sysdig's investigation into EmeraldWhale
